AI Description: The py-pillow-simd library is a faster and optimized fork of the Python Imaging Library (PIL) with SIMD support. It provides a powerful image processing library, allowing users to open, manipulate, and save many different image file formats.
Core Features: Support For Various Image File Formats, Optimized For Speed Using Simd (Single Instruction, Multiple Data), Image Manipulation Capabilities, Color Space Conversions, Image Enhancement & Filtering Functions
General Tags: Image Processing, Python Library, Optimized Performance
